Title: An Act Changing the Name of the National Orthopedic Hospital in Quezon City to National Orthopedic Hospital and Rehabilitation Medicine Center
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 301
An Act Changing the Name of the National Orthopedic Hospital in Quezon City to National Orthopedic Hospital and Rehabilitation Medicine Center
Section 1. The name of the National Orthopedic Hospital in Quezon City is hereby changed to National Orthopedic Hospital and Rehabilitation Medicine Center.1Ã¢wphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
